high_consensus.description: Rollback guidance for mid-sprint gate failures (branching strategy, revert policy)
CI integration for validation scripts (GH Actions, PR required checks, scheduled runs)
Capacity planning with buffer and explicit cut-line for de-scoping
Local dev environment setup prerequisite (env vars, seed data, startup steps)
Weekly verification mechanism (scheduled CI, notifications, triage SLA)

blockers.concern: Sprint 1 scope too large for 2 days (README + deterministic gen + ecosystem + naming)
Route extraction strictness (>5% fail + >=80 + zero missing) may deadlock progress
Tier 2 contract checks unsafe for POST/PUT/DELETE routes (side effects)
BUTTERFREEZONE determinism across platforms requires fully pinned toolchain
